title: Sulfur-containing fossil fuels cause acid rain

content.question: The primary cause of acid precipitation in the northeastern United States is

choices.label: the large number of automobile air conditioners leaking Freon
burning of sulfur-containing fossil fuels to produce electricity
deforestation, which reduces the number of trees removing atmospheric CO2
strip-mining, which releases large quantities of particulates into the atmosphere
global warming, which speeds the chemical reactions that produce acids

content.answer: burning of sulfur-containing fossil fuels to produce electricity

skill.text: Skill 5.E: Explain what the data implies or illustrates about environmental issues.
